name: Create HubSpot CRM contacts from Custom Webhooks and adding them to lists after validating email with MailboxValidator
description: Every time a custom webhook is triggered, Make will validate the email output from that webhook using MailboxValidator. If the email is verified, it will create or update a contact in Hubspot CRM with the output data of the webhook. It will then move that contact to a specific list depending on the status of the email address.
